transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan boliye.
Executive: Yes sir, aapne check kiya wo aapka.
Customer: Kya check karna hai boliye.
Executive: Aap bol rahe the na galti se click ho gaya hoga video meet ke liye.
Customer: Kya?
Executive: Aap bol rahe the na galti se by mistake click ho gaya hoga video meet interest ke liye.
Customer: Kya click kiya boliye.
Executive: Are you comfortable in English or Hindi?
Customer: Aap Hindi mein boliye.
Executive: Okay.
English mein bhi bol sakti hu main koi problem to nahi hai.
Customer: Nahi nahi nahi.
Executive: Nahi nahi aapko jo samajh aaye aap mujhe wo bataiye.
Customer: Aap Hindi mein boliye na koi dikkat nahi hai mere ko aap bataiye.
Executive: Dekho jaise aap ho client theek hai agar aapko video meet karna hai mere sath man lo to aapke portal par ek option aata hai.
Customer: Ye kahan par hai boliye to main portal mein hua boliye kahan par hai.
Executive: Already click ho chuka hai aapne nahi kiya ho to ho sakta hai kisi aur ne kiya ho.
Customer: Kahan par hai thoda bataiye na kahan par hai location kahan par hai.
Executive: Are click ho chuka hai to kaise batau.
Customer: Achcha.
To mail mein to aayega na madam.
Executive: Mere paas aaya hai concern.
Customer: Aapke mail mein kaise kahan se milega wo kahan se milega video ka.
Executive: Are aapke alava aur bhi koi chala raha hai kya IndiaMART?
Customer: Haan aur ek chala raha hai.
Executive: Aap ek baar unse confirm kar lijiye shayad unse click ho gaya ho aapke sath mein hai kya wo abhi.
Customer: Bas bas ek minute theek hai theek hai bas bas.
Executive: Kya click kiya ek baar bataiye madam.
Customer: Video meet ke liye interest ho gaya.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Haan madam boliye.
Executive: Yes sir.
Customer: Aapne kis mein kis mein click kiya hai.
Executive: Sir ab mujhe kaise pata hoga aapki site kya hai aap kisne kiya hai mujhe wo nahi pata chal raha hai isme.
Executive: Isliye maine aapko priority basis pe connect kiya hai kyunki maine shayad abhi just hi dashboard pe jaake shayad karte hain.
Customer: Problem ta ki hoyeche.
Executive: O bolche click koreche kothay click koreche.
Customer: Bolte parchi na je amra ki kore bolbo.
Customer: Uni bolche click koreche kintu kothay koreche ki kore bujhbo.
Executive: Eto setai to ami jigesh korchi click ta kothay koreche.
Customer: Hoyeche ta ki problem ta.
Executive: Ami to bolchi click kiye ta ki click koreche seta to bolte parchi na.
Customer: Haan mam.
Executive: Haan boliye to abhi abhi kya kya karna padega boliye.
Executive: Agar aapne agar aapne matlab intentionally kiya to main aapko kis liye kiya hai to main video meet kar sakti hu aur agar aap se galti se ho gaya hai to fir main isko close kar deti hu.
Customer: Haan galti se hi hua hai na.
Executive: Haan haan bilkul.
Executive: Achcha achcha physical se to nahi hua.
Customer: Haan?
Executive: Sir jita se baat hui thi unse to nahi hua.
Customer: Nahi nahi nahi wo wo shayad usse hi hua hai magar galti se kuch kar diya hai.
Executive: Achcha achcha achcha aur jo buyleads ka issue tha to sir hai available abhi.
Customer: Haan wo to theek thak hi hai abhi.
Executive: Achcha nahi sir ne kaha tha na ki abhi concern ki close mat kijiyega.
Customer: Theek hai wo wala aap resolve kar dijiye baad mein aapko contact kar lenge.
Executive: Ek baar sir se baat kara deti hu confirm kar do.
Customer: Haan madam boliye.
Executive: Hmm ek baar sir se baat kara do gayi.
Customer: Haan main bol raha hu sir hi bol raha hu.
Executive: Achcha achcha achcha sir wo ye to chalo by mistake ho gaya hoga.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Hmm to main kyun close kar deti hu.
Customer: Nahi wo call open hua hai kyunki mere ko lead nahi mil raha isiliye call to open kiya hai wo to sahi hai.
Executive: Nahi nahi do do do concern ho gaya na.
Customer: Ek to buylead wala.
Customer: Haan buylead se aapka West Bengal se kuch to nahi aaya.
Executive: Hmm to usme jo abhi aapne jo company law wali West Bengal mein kuch bhi nahi aaya.
Customer: Ye to mere ko nahi mil raha hai iska hi complaint hai aur kisi ka complaint nahi hai.
Executive: Haan main samajh rahi hu lekin sir jaise aapka jo jo kaam hai company law wagera isme isme mera jo kaam hai agar aapko yahan se agar kuch kaam hoga samajh lijiye madam practical performance koi kisi ka income tax karna hai theek hai to hum online kar sakte hain lekin kisi ka agar GST ka department mein jana hai GST ka case ka matter hai to hum yahan se Maharashtra jagah kam to nahi kar sakte na.
Customer: WB se mane West Bengal se Maharashtra jagah kam kaise karega yahan ka high court alag hai wahan ka high court alag hai to alag sa ho gaya na madam.
Executive: Pehle aap kya kehna hai madam.
Customer: Nahi nahi wo isiliye bol raha hu aap WB mein rehne dijiye uske andar jo hai hum daliye na isiliye to bol raha hu West Bengal ka andar jo hai wahi daliye na madam.
Customer: Sir dekho aap main aapko pehle bhi bola tha ki band karta hu aadha ghanta baad main aapko phone kar leta hu main thoda kaam mein hu main aapko aadha ghanta baad.
Executive: Okay madam okay thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer clicked on video meet by mistake.

- No buyleads from West Bengal.



Resolution:

- Executive offered to close the video meet request.

- Executive will resolve the buyleads issue.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back after half an hour.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, video meet, west bengal, complaint
